transactions.details: Houston Astrosplaced CFChas McCormickon the 10-day injured list retroactive to May 30, 2025. Left oblique strain.
Baltimore Oriolesplaced 1BRyan Mountcastleon the 10-day injured list. Right hamstring strain.
Chicago White Soxplaced RHPMiguel Castroon the 15-day injured list retroactive to May 29, 2025. Patellar tendon tear in his right knee.
St. Louis Cardinalsplaced RFJordan Walkeron the 10-day injured list retroactive to May 29, 2025. Left wrist inflammation.
Minnesota Twinssigned free agent RHPTeague Conradto a minor league contract.
St. Louis Cardinalsselected the contract of LFRyan Viladefrom Memphis Redbirds.
Athleticsoptioned RHPAnthony Maldonadoto Las Vegas Aviators.
Houston Astrosrecalled SSShay Whitcombfrom Sugar Land Space Cowboys.
Athleticsrecalled RHPOsvaldo Bidofrom Las Vegas Aviators.
St. Louis Cardinalsrecalled RHPRoddery Muñozfrom Memphis Redbirds.
St. Louis Cardinalsoptioned RHPGordon Graceffoto Memphis Redbirds.
